commands.description: Lists all enabled and disabled Koala Extensions on your server
Enable a Koala Extension on your server
Disable a Koala Extension on your server
Change the customisable part of the welcome message of your server
Sends out the welcome message manually to all members of your server
Shows this server's current welcome message
Clears a given number of messages from the channel.
Returns the ping of a bot
Returns a link to the KoalaBot Support Discord Server
Create a new message that will be available for sending
Change the title of the embedded message
Change the content of the embedded message
Add a role to list of people to send the announcement to
Remove a role from a list of people to send the announcement to
Post a constructed embedded message to the channel where the command is invoked
Send a pending announcement
Cancel a pending announcement
Gives a user a chosen custom colour, or removes the custom colour with 'k!customColour no'
Lists the protected roles, whose colours are protected from being imitated by a custom colour, in a server
Adds a role's colour to the list of protected roles
Removes a role's colour from the list of protected roles
Lists the roles in a server whose users are permitted to have their own custom colours
Adds a role to the list of roles allowed to have a custom colour
Removes a role from the list of roles allowed to have a custom colour
Create a new, blank rfr message. Default title is React for Role. Default description is Roles below!
Delete an existing rfr message
Add a server-wide role required to react to/use rfr functionality. If no role is added, anyone can use rfr functionality
Removes a server-wide role from the group of roles someone requires to use rfr functionality
Lists the server-specific role permissions for using rfr functionality
Edit the description of an existing rfr message
Edit the title of an existing rfr message
Edit the thumbnail of an existing rfr message
Edit the inline property of embed fields in rfr embeds
Add emoji/role combos to an existing rfr message
Remove emoji/role combos from an existing rfr message
Cosmetic fix method if the bot ever has a moment and doesn't react with the correct emojis/has duplicates
Filter a word or string of text. Type is defaulted to 'banned' which will delete the message and warn the user. Use type 'risky' to just warn the user.
Filter a regex string. Type is defaulted to 'banned' which will delete the message and warn the user. Use type 'risky' to just warn the user.
Get a list of filtered words in the server.
Add a mod channel for receiving filtered message information (User, Timestamp, Message) to be sent to.
Remove a mod channel from the server.
See a list of mod channels in the server.
Add a new ignored user for the server. This users' messages will be ignored by the Text Filter.
Add a new ignored channel for the server. Messages in this channel will be ignored by the Text Filter.
See a list of ignored users/channels in the server.
Unfilter a word/string/regex of text that was previously filtered.
Unignore a user/channel that was previously set as ignored.
Edit the default message put in a Twitch Alert Notification
Shows the current default message for Twitch Alerts
Shows all current users and teams in a Twitch Alert
Add a Twitch user to a Twitch Alert
Remove a user from a Twitch Alert
Add a Twitch team to a Twitch alert
Edit the default message put in a Twitch Alert Notification
Set up a role and email pair for KoalaBot to verify users with
Disable an existing verification listener
Removes a role from all users who have it and marks them as needing to re-verify before giving it back.
List the current verification setup for the server
